title: Ranked PLacements are a f@#$ing Joke!!
body:
I won 7 out of 10 of my placements and got put into bronze 3 how the f@#$ does that work out riot explain it to me.. no way in F@#$ing hell i should of been put in F!@#ing bronze 3 your a joke and unless you can explain to me how you get put 2 tiers from the lowest rank in game with 7-10 wins YOUR SHIT IS F!@#'d up Riot!! 

-yours sincerely very F!@#ing pissed off league player!!

replies.body:
Dude, relax man. Placements aren't static for every player, meaning that even if you won ten out of ten games, you're not going to be instantly put into challenger tier. Inversely, losing all of you placement games won't mean you're going to bronze tier.

Your placement matches pit you against opponents that are based off of your MMR you accumulated while playing normal games. If you don't know what that is, I'll happily explain it for you.

Winning seven out of ten placements is almost the usual for what most players get. Don't be disheartened by it, it just means you'll have more game time in getting to the top!

Best of luck in your ranked games!
